name: 2025 11th International Conference on Innovation and Industrial Logistics
content: Publication: ICIIL 2025, as workshop of ICTLE 2025, all accepted and registered papers will be published in the ICTLE 2025 conference proceedings as a special chapter, which will submitted for EI Compendex, Scopus et al, same as last year.
organizers: Faculty of Science and Technology (FST) of University of Macau
